title: The use of spiral staircase shall be limited to low occupant load and to a building not exceeding 9 m
clause_text: The use of spiral staircase shall be limited to low occupant load and to a building not exceeding 9 m. in height. A spiral stair case shall be not less than 1500 mm. in diameter and shall be designed to give adequate headroom.
